org.apache.felix.ipojo.extender

Interface Declaration

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ExtensionDeclaration, InstanceDeclaration, TypeDeclaration
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDeclaration, DefaultExtensionDeclaration, DefaultInstanceDeclaration, DefaultTypeDeclaration

    public interface Declaration
    A declaration is a creation instruction of an entity (Component type, Factory, Instance...). All declarations are exposed as services. Processors are tracking the adequate declaration type and create the entity.

    Declaration can be bound or unbound whether they are fulfilled. When they are unbound, a message or/and an error can be set.

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      Marks the declaration bound.

      Gets the declaration status.

        Returns:
